author: jm
msg: reinstated parts of the main website look and feel, overriding previous (undiscussed) font and look-and-feel change.    (also removed some redundant CSS code, and non-CSS HTML tags and attributes; all browsers that support colours and fonts support CSS now.)

author: akarasulu
msg: switched to using dc=example,dc=com instead of dc=domain,dc=com which is way too confusing

author: kmarsden
msg: Set keepAlive on by default add static property derby.drda.keepAlive to
allow keepAlive to be turned off.

author: antonio
msg: Fix bug #31564- [XSP] - JXPath logicsheet: Allow use relative contexts in <jxpath:for-each>. Add a new tag <jpath:set-lenient lenient='true|false'>

author: antonio
msg: Fix bug #31564- [XSP] - JXPath logicsheet: Allow use relative contexts in <jxpath:for-each>. Add a new tag <jpath:set-lenient lenient='true|false'>
